text.section: For the purpose of uniformity of requirements between states and the federal government the department may, after a public hearing, adopt regulations in conformity with the primary pesticide standards, particularly as to the labeling, registration requirements and "restricted use pesticides" as established by EPA or other federal or state agencies.

law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295, sec. 55, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 200, sec. 9. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 218, sec. 6, effective July 1, 1956.
